name: LAX VR
summary: LAX VR is the ultimate first-person VR lacrosse experience, offering both Box and Field lacrosse modes, including an exhilarating 6v6 field game where you can play as a field player, long pole, or goalie. Game modes include: Field, Box, Braveheart, Shooting, Goalie, Longstick, Shoot Around, and Wall Ball. Our Medicine Game pays tribute to the Indigenous roots of lacrosse, set in a mythical historic environment. Hone your skills, customize your twig, and enjoy the immersive world of VR lacrosse.
